name: DoDa e-Agency Core Platform
description: Development of the Open Source operating system for the DoDa e-Agency platform, the first AI-based web agency, designed to coordinate multiple AI agents and assist the team in executing online tasks and controlling digital interfaces. This system will be implemented directly on the agency's devices to optimize workflows and enhance automation. (Powered by AnduinOS - www.anduinos.com)

name: Large Action Model (LAM)
description: Development of a Large Action Model that can understand and interact with software interfaces, enabling users to perform actions by simply pushing a button and speaking instructions.

name: Cross-Platform Agent System
description: Development of a cross-platform AI agent system that can operate across desktop and mobile platforms, coordinating multiple specialized agents to complete complex tasks.

name: Open Source Device Integration
description: Integration of DaDoOS with the Open Source hardware device, like an orange raspberry with a lcd, to create a seamless AI assistant experience in a pocket-sized form factor.

name: Mobile AI Assistant Interface
description: Development of a mobile interface for the DaDoOS AI assistant, allowing users to interact with the system through natural language and receive visual feedback on their requests.

name: AI Software Interaction Framework
description: Development of a framework that allows AI agents to understand and interact with existing software interfaces, enabling automation of complex tasks across different applications.

name: LAM Playground
description: Development of a playground environment for teaching and storing web-based procedures, allowing users to train the Large Action Model on custom tasks and workflows.

name: DoDa Community Development Tools
description: Creation of open-source tools and documentation to help the community develop custom applications and extensions for the Open Source device and DaDoOS platform.
